divs: sighting detailssix of us (4 adults & 2 kids) were sitting in the living room talking. the living room faces an outdoor, screened patio. my husband saw something outside and brought it to our attention. all 6 of us went onto the patio and observed a group of orange\reddish lights in the sky. we all knew it wasn't normal, but we spent a few minutes debating what they could be, but we knew, and i was excited as hell! there were more than 10 lights, they changed formation a few times and then slowly disappeared like matches being put out.
Summary: Group of a orange, star-like lights in the sky, made different formations
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Plantation
There were no other sightings in Plantation on or around January 26th 2013
